2.1.7. src.preprocess.vhi module¶

  • Add lat lon coordinates

  • add time coordinates

  • subset Kenya

  • merge into one time (~500MB)

class src.preprocess.vhi.VHIPreprocessor(data_folder: pathlib.Path = PosixPath('data'))¶

Bases: src.preprocess.base._BasePreProcessor

Preprocess the VHI data

Parameters

data_folder – The location of the data folder

dataset = 'vhi'¶
preprocess(subset_str: Optional[str] = 'kenya', regrid: Optional[pathlib.Path] = None, parallel: bool = True, resample_time: Optional[str] = 'M', upsampling: bool = False, cleanup: bool = True) → None¶

Preprocess all of the VHI files to produce one subset file.

Parameters

  • subset_str – Whether to subset an area when preprocessing. Must be one of {‘kenya’, ‘east_africa’, ‘ethiopia’}

  • regrid – If a Path is passed, the CHIRPS files will be regridded to have the same grid as the dataset at that Path. If None, no regridding happens

  • resample_time – If not None, defines the time length to which the data will be resampled

  • upsampling – If True, tells the class the time-sampling will be upsampling. In this case, nearest instead of mean is used for the resampling

  • parallel – If True, run the preprocessing in parallel

  • cleanup – If True, delete interim files created by the class
